directions: Place the sugar, salt, olive oil, water, and flour in a standing mixers work bowl
Tear off a small piece of dough and flatten into a disc, and knead the dough for additional 10 minutes
Turn the oven to its highest temperature,Spread the pizza sauce evenly onto the pizza,Slide the pizza onto the tile and bake for 7 minutes.
recipes.title: Pizza

directions: Heat chocolate chips and 4 tablespoons cream in microwave in 1-cup glass measuring cup at 50 percent power just until chocolate is melted, about 30 to 35 seconds. Stir to blend.
Using 2 1/2-inch-diameter cookie cutter, cut out round from each angel food cake slice. Place 1 cake round in each of 4 wine goblets or old-fashioned glasses.
Top each cake round with 3 banana slices, 1 heaping tablespoon mascarpone mixture, bittersweet chocolate sauce, and sprinkling of almonds.Repeat parfait layering 1 more time and serve.
recipes.title: Chocolate, Almond, and Banana Parfaits

directions: Combine the garlic,mustard , vinegar and two salt spoons in the blend
Mix thoroughly and add mayonnaise and blend them together
Wash and dry the lettuce ,then combine the lettuce with the sauce.
recipes.title: Caesar Salad

directions: Mix the zaatar and olive oil aside.
Sift the flour,yeast , sugar , and salt in and electrical robot and mix aroun 10-12 minutes.
Add water gradually , then cover the bowl with cling film and put it in a warm place.
Spread the zaatar onto the dough and cook for 5 minutes.
recipes.title: Manakesh

directions: Heat the oil in a 3-quart thick-bottomed saucepan on medium high heat. If you are using coconut oil, allow all of the solid oil to melt.
Melt Butter in the pan
Wait for the popcorn kernels to pop.
Add Salt
recipes.title: Popcorn

directions: Dry-fry the beef in a frying pan until brown and crumbly, stirring occasionally and breaking it up with a wooden spoon

Add the onion, green pepper and garlic; cook, stirring occasionally, until softened. Stir in the herbs and spices; season to taste with salt and pepper. Add the tomato puree and mix well. Cover and cook gently for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.

Place a little of the mixture on each tortilla and roll up, or spoon into the taco shells. Secure tortillas with a cocktail stick. If using tortillas, heat the oil in a frying pan and then fry the rolls quickly until golden. Serve with your choice of accompaniments.
recipes.title: Mexican Tacos
